content.text: This plugin makes you write like a drunken man. Usage:
content.code: /script load drunken.pl /beer Hello I am verry drunk at the moment!
content.text: This will write something like this into the current channel:
content.code: Hlleo I am vrrey dunrk at the mnetmo!
content.text: You may download it from the SVN section above. Have a lot of fun ;)
